property.name: testScenario
property.description: Used to indicate which test scenario to try in generate script. There are 4 different test modes; 1, 2, 3, and 4. 1: Test sending no data. 2: Test making only metadata full. 3: Test making data full. 4: Test sending a multiple zlms (with different opcodes), a single word message, filling data and filling up metadata. For configurations where there are at least 6 metadata records. AV-4607 currently blocks this scenario from outputing the correct results.
